headline: Super Micro Computer, Inc. (SMCI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Super Micro Computer, Inc. on Deep Value Returns’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SMCI. Super Micro Computer, Inc.’s share was trading at $40.78 as of September 2nd. SMCI’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.27 and 15.60 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. SuperMicro (SMCI) has […]
